thread.title: In this new Steve Jobs trailer, the walls are closing in on Apple's icon
thread.title_full: In this new Steve Jobs trailer, the walls are closing in on Apple's icon - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: In this new Steve Jobs trailer, the walls are closing in on Apple's icon
text:
Danny Boyle and Aaron Sorkin's Steve Jobs is speeding toward its October 9th release date, and the movie's second trailer has just been released. Its first trailer was released in May, and the movie is adapted from Walter Isaacson's lauded 2011 Jobs biography.
Developing... Â»
